biography.value: When a zaratan is summoned from the Elemental Plane of Earth, the ground rises up to take the shape of a hulking, armored reptile. A zaratanâ€™s steps trigger shock waves severe enough to level structures. It expresses its rage through trumpeting calls and the occasional boulder or blast of debris it spews from its cavernous maw. If seriously injured, a zaratan retracts its appendages to gain shelter beneath its impervious shell, biding its time until it recovers and can resume its march.

details.environment: Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Underdark

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:

description.value:
The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot &Reference[cube]{cube}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 25 format=long]]. A creature takes [[/damage 6d10 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d10 + @mod type=thunder average=true]] damage.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The zaratan can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatureâ€™s turn. The zaratan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Stomp. The zaratan makes one Stomp attack.

Move. The zaratan moves up to its speed.

Spit (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan makes one Spit Rock attack.

Retract (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.

Revitalize (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains [[/damage 5d20 type=heal average=false]] hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.

Emerge (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan emerges from its shell and makes one Spit Rock attack. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
After moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan sends a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must succeed on a [[/save con 25 format=long]] or the creatureâ€™s &Reference[concentration]{concentration} is broken.

The shock wave deals [[/damage 100 thunder average=false]] damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structureâ€™s height must make a [[/save dex 25 format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage 5d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}, and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, requiring a successful DC 20 &Reference[str]{Strength} (&Reference[ath]{Athletics}) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesnâ€™t fall &Reference[prone]{prone} or become trapped.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
